tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE surgical_instruments (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  instrument_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  calibration_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  precision_adjustment FLOAT NOT NULL,
  last_service_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE precision_adjustments (
  adjustment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  instrument_id INT,
  adjustment_date DATE,
  adjustment_type VARCHAR(50),
  adjustment_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE calibration_data (
    id INT,
    instrument_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    calibration_value FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

CREATE TABLE calibration_history (
    history_id INT,
    instrument_id INT,
    calibration_date DATE,
    technician_name VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (history_id)
)

CREATE TABLE precision_adjustments (
    adjustment_id INT,
    instrument_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    adjustment_factor FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (adjustment_id)
)

CREATE TABLE instrument_data (
    instrument_id INT,
    serial_number VARCHAR(20),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (instrument_id)
)

CREATE TABLE CalibrationData (
 id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 instrument_id UUID,
 calibration_date DATE,
 calibration_values TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PrecisionAdjustments (
 id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 instrument_id UUID,
 precision_date DATE,
 adjustment_values TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SurgicalInstruments (
 id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 instrument_name VARCHAR,
 manufacturer VARCHAR,
 model VARCHAR,
 serial_number VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Surgeons (
 id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 surgeon_name VARCHAR,
 specialization VARCHAR,
 contact_information TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Hospitals (
 id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 hospital_name VARCHAR,
 location VARCHAR,
 contact_information TEXT
)
